topics.body:
A question for the entire thread, what would you do with "fuck you" money?

By this I mean the kind of money where you can afford to tell everyone with any ideas about how it should be spent or saved to fuck right off, and I'm not interested in the "moral" answers. We'd all probably dump a lot of that money on charity or people we care about, I want to know what you'd use that money on for you.

Me? I'd go on a cross country food tour. I want to try the regional diner and street food of every single state. I want brisket in Texas, pizza in New York, french dips in Chicago and so on.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a3c35f636872296b0a0500#post_53a3c35f636872296b0a0500
Oh, something about what is happening in the Middle East right now. Apparently, the leader of ISIS, who is described to be one of the most powerful and ruthless terrorists out there, got kicked out of al-Qaida a few years back, because he was *too violent*. Now, if even al-Qaida thinks a person is too violent and extreme, that tells you alot.

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a3bffd63687229ed050400#post_53a3bffd63687229ed050400
If we're not putting a limit on just how much money we're talking here, I'd probably build a mobile real-life aperture science facility (just rooms of manufacturing at the highest capacity instead of test chambers or whathaveyou) and dominate the world through manufacturing means to manipulate matter itself.  Invent means to become a demigod-like person if you will, because "fuck you".

Of course, if money _is_ limited in this situation, I'd probably use whatever boatloads I'd have to make rockin' awesome cartoons with actual sense and intelligence to them.
